name: Voice Of Command
text:
Use during a model's activation if it is within 6" of your leader model. Choose one of the following benefits:
  • Take Aim: This model may immediately perform a free Aim action.
  • Move Move Move!: This model may immediately perform a free Walk action.
  • Fix Bayonets: This model may perform a Charge action as a short action.
  • Get Back In The Fight!: This model may reroll a failed Recovery roll.
